alert.note: Alert for Berks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 22 at 2:58PM EST until December 24 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM FRIDAY TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Sussex, Warren and Morris. In Pennsylvania, Berks. * WHEN...From 3 PM Friday to 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS....A strong cold front will move through Friday bringing a very sharp drop in temperatures with strong southerly winds shifting to strong westerly. By mid Friday afternoon, this combination of wind and cold will result in wind chills of 10 below zero or lower with wind chills as low as 15 below zero Friday night into Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
